Ingest Anything.
Query Everything.

Build sophisticated image search without the complexity of vector embeddings, databases, and infrastructure.

Case Study → Documentation →

From Raw Images to Intuitive Search

Frame simplifies the entire process of turning raw data into searchable insights. From seamless ingestion and powerful embedding to efficient storage and quick query responses, Frame’s got everything you need to supercharge your search components.

📄

Ingestion

Ingest data from anywhere and normalize it into structured documents.

🧠

Embedding

Transform raw inputs into vector embeddings optimized for search.

📚

Storage

Persist your embedded data for fast, efficient querying.

🔍

Query

Retrieve relevant results with semantic and contextual understanding.

Find What You’re Really Looking For

Query with Natural Language

Watch as Frame transforms complex queries into precise visual results — powered by real-time vector embeddings and our lightweight, self-hosted architecture.

Reverse Image Search

Upload a photo to uncover visually and semantically similar results — whether it’s near-duplicates, related styles, or thematically linked content.

Smart Recommendations

Whether you’re exploring artwork, researching topics, or browsing product catalogs, Frame helps surface “more like this” results that actually feel relevant.

Built By Developers
For Developers

Effortless Deployment. Instant API Integration.

With Frame, setting up and deploying is a breeze — simply use our intuitive CLI to get up and running in no time. Plus, our SDK is designed for smooth API interaction, letting you integrate powerful search and recommendation features with just a few lines of code.
